channel.title: Total lvl: 1980
channel.description: I did master, and it said that my total level was 1980 and I added up all of the 99s on my server and it's definitely not 1980 so how do I fix that?

item.title: Total lvl: 1980
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

It was delta’s failed base.

Obviously doesnt know what a loop is.

You can honestly HALF the size of delta’s client class by adding loops

item.title: Total lvl: 1980
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

[quote=“r0ckstar96, post:9, topic:293369”]Here’s what I have in my client.java, I’m using a Delta source btw

public void getTotalLevel() { if(playerRights >= 0) return; int a0 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); int a1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]); int a2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); int a3 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); int a4 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]); int a5 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); int a6 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]); int a7 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]); int a8 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]); int a9 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]); int a10 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]); int a11 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]); int a12 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]); int a13 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]); int a14 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]); int a15 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]); int a16 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]); int a17 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]); int a18 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]); int a19 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]); int a20 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]); int a21 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[21]); total = a0+a1+a2+a3+a4+a5+a6+a7+a8+a9+a10+a11+a12+a13+a14+a15+a16+a17+a18+a19+a20+a21; sendQuest("Total Lvl: "+total+"", 3984); } [/quote]

OMFG learn how to use a loop

public void getTotalLevel() { int total = 0; for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) total += p.getLevel(i); sendQuest("Total Lvl: "+total+"", 3984); }

Read full topic

item.title: Total lvl: 1980
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Here’s what I have in my client.java, I’m using a Delta source btw

public void getTotalLevel() {
if(playerRights >= 0)
return;
int a0 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
int a1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
int a2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
int a3 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
int a4 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
int a5 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
int a6 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
int a7 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]);
int a8 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]);
int a9 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]);
int a10 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]);
int a11 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]);
int a12 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]);
int a13 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]);
int a14 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]);
int a15 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]);
int a16 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]);
int a17 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]);
int a18 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]);
int a19 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]);
int a20 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]);
int a21 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[21]);
total = a0+a1+a2+a3+a4+a5+a6+a7+a8+a9+a10+a11+a12+a13+a14+a15+a16+a17+a18+a19+a20+a21;
sendQuest("Total Lvl: "+total+"", 3984);
}

Read full topic

@_Rich wrote:

int i_1_ = 0; for (int i = 0; i < p.playerLevel.length; i++) { i_1_ += p.getLevel(i); } p.frames.setString("Total Lvl: " + i_1_ + "", 3984);
